body.name: Dikuer Heated Lumbar Support Pillow, Memory Foam Lumbar Support Pillow with Detachable Heating Pad for Lower Back Pain Relief, Improve Posture, Back Support Pillow for Office Chair, Car
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 10 mins
features: 【Professional Pain Relief and Fatigue】: The appearance of this lumbar support pillow is designed to fit the natural curve of the waist. It has a wrapped two-wing design that helps improve spine posture and prevent strain on the lumbar muscles. The central arch-like area resembles a pair of invisible hands supporting the most vital part of the human spine. This back support pillow can perfectly fill the gap between the waist and the bed or chair, providing support and relieving muscle tension.

【Removable Heating Pad】：We have equipped our heated lumbar support pillow with a detachable heating pad that contains a fast-heating carbon fiber heating element and is covered by a breathable mesh fabric. This enables better heat transfer to your waist. Compared to regular back support cushion, our lumbar support pillow not only supports the waist but also promotes blood circulation and relieves waist pain. Additionally, back heating pad can be used to alleviate pain in the legs, neck, and shoulders.

【Adjustable Temperature and Timer】:The heated back pillow with controller visualization features 3 heating levels from 95°F to 131°F, as well as 3 timer settings from 20 minutes to 60 minutes. You can easily monitor the remaining time and make adjustments. The heated pillow for back is powered by a 6.56-foot long USB charging cable, compatible with standard 5V/1-2A USB outlets, such as PC, wall chargers, power banks, and even car chargers.

【5S Slow Rebound Memory Foam Pillow】: Unparalleled Support - Made of breathable and soft memory foam, it rebounds within 5 seconds after pressing. Even with prolonged use, it can still support your waist. The memory foam lumbar pillow's exterior is made of removable and washable 3D mesh fabric, ensuring a cool and comfortable back. Additionally, the lower back pillow features adjustable straps and anti-slip particles on the back to securely fix it onto an office chair.

【Widely Used】: The heated lumbar support pillow is specially designed for truck drivers, office workers, teachers, students, and the elderly. The memory foam is made of polyurethane, making it safe for use by pregnant women and children. It can be used on beds, sofas, offices, airplanes, during travel, as a gift, or in various other situations. You can sleep on your side, back, or stomach with it, and it can also be used as a leg pillow by placing it under the calves or knees.

Does it take a long time to heat up? The Dikuer heated back pillow can be warmed up in just two minutes, reaching a maximum temperature of 131°. It is recommended to start with a low temperature for adjustment. If you have any inquiries, kindly leave a message: dikuerus(at)outlook.com Can the lumbar pillow be washed? The office chair lumbar support has a hidden zipper, so you can remove the pillowcase and wash. It is not wash or expose the lumbar pillow core to sunlight in order to avoid reducing its lifespan. It can be hung in a well-ventilated area. How long are the shoulder straps? Are they detachable? The shoulder straps of this office chair back support are 28 feet long (Unstretched) and 1 foot wide, with excellent stretch and resilience. They can be securely fastened to office chairs, and if you don't need them, they can be detached. Can this lumbar pillow be used on an airplane? Fold the heated lumbar support pillow into the included storage bag for easy carrying on the plane, without taking up much space. The back of the support pillow is designed with anti-slip particles, reducing its movement frequency. Will it sag like many memory foam pillows? I want solid support. The lower back pillow is made of high-quality memory foam, which evenly distributes the pressure on the body, avoiding noticeable deformation or collapse after long-term use. When not in use, it will restore to its original shape within 5 seconds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Firm and very Comfortable, I can sit comfortably on my chair for long periods with this lumbar support without feeling strain. It has a stretchable and adjustable belt, which make it easily attach to the chair.The heating feature is a plus. It doesn't heat too much but you can feel the difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and versatile
reviews.reviewText: I love that the heating pad itself is separate from the lumbar pillow- it makes this product so much more than a heated lumbar support. I use the heating pad on my legs, my neck, and other parts of my back, with or without the pillow.The USB controller it comes with is simple and easy to use. It has a small screen, and two buttons to set everything. Clean and simple, even my parents use it without any issues.It gets pretty warm, but not too hot to overheat and feel dangerous. I like the timer option too, because you can turn it on and fall asleep with no worries about it continuously heating and hurting you. The pillow comes in a drawstring carrying case, which was a very nice surprise, makes it easy to store away cleanly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice Lumbar Support Pillow
reviews.reviewText: I bought this heated Lumbar Support Pillow to help reduce back strain and pressure when I sit in chair for long time. I just tried it, I love this pillow!It is very comfortable and firm. It’s very easy to fix the heating pad since it has a stretchable belt. Also, it’s easy to select temperature and timer which gives nice control of heating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wow, It provides excellent support for my waistI love its clever design that perfectly fits my waist and eliminates the gap between my back and the chair. The heating effect is also impressive, with three adjustable temperature levels. Plus, the heating pad is detachable, so I can wash the pillow without worrying about damaging the heating pad. The straps of the pillow are removable too, allowing me to attach it to any chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and warm
reviews.reviewText: I have low back pain sometimes and bought this pillow support recommended by a good friend. The set up is extremely easy and I immediately love it. The pillow is very firm and can support my lower back very well. The most I like is that I can adjust the temperature and keep my back warm. The product is very safe too. I will definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great support pillow
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is sturdy and comfortable. It supports my back very well on my office chair. The heating function is very nice when I sit for a long time and feel some pain. I usually turn the temperature mode to "high" and set the timer. The timer won't let the pillow heat for a long time. Highly recommend it!
